com.treatment

Class ExaminationControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.treatment.ExaminationControler

  • public class ExaminationControler
extends java.lang.Object
    ExaminationControler class contains all functions needed to certify the information sent by the user to the Examen Object
    This class contains 2 public functions and 3 private functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    C.DEBAISIEUX

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExaminationControler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static boolean checkUpJComboBoxInput(javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the index selected in the JComboVBox is over 0 The boolean fieldOk is set on true
      private static boolean checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today
      private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the ExceptionControler.numericException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
      static boolean inputFieldControler(javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
      two different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
      static boolean inputFieldControler(javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
      Three different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true

    • Method Detail

      • inputFieldControler

        public static boolean inputFieldControler(javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                          javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                          com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
        Three different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
        Parameters:
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(JTextField), checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(JDateChooser), checkUpJComboBoxInput(JComboBox)

      • inputFieldControler

        public static boolean inputFieldControler(javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                          com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
        two different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
        Parameters:
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(JDateChooser), checkUpJComboBoxInput(JComboBox)

      • checkUpJTextFieldIntInput

        private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        If the ExceptionControler.numericException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
        Parameters:
        text - : a String information writen by the user
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        ExceptionControler.numericException(JTextField)

      • checkUpJDateChooserDateInput

        private static boolean checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today
        Parameters:
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean

      • checkUpJComboBoxInput

        private static boolean checkUpJComboBoxInput(javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        If the index selected in the JComboVBox is over 0 The boolean fieldOk is set on true
        Parameters:
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
